creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: Figural group; man in a purple coat approaches from behind a woman wearing a flowered skirt and ruts colored top; he is holding a boquet of flowers which he is about to offer her; a dog sits at their feet to the left.
markings: blue crossed swords, impressed \'85\' and hand marked \'P147\' under base
title: Couple with flowers and dog
